message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and desires, is priced at $1200000. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition that respects its worth while offering you an excellent deal. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details about the product.
